items.sentence: I can\'t afford to eat at expensive restaurants.
I can\'t believe Tom never told Mary about John.
I can\'t explain the situation better than that.
The situation called for quick, decisive action.
The situation was really difficult to deal with.
I just wish I\'d never gotten involved with you.
I know that I can\'t do that as well as you can.
You should\'ve let me drive you home last night.
I couldn\'t help but admire Tom\'s perseverance.
Do you want me to explain to you how that works?
